name: Locked (itch) (JeanPant)
description:
LOCKED

Introduction

Locked is a simple pinball style game, where you click and drag the player ball to collide with walls and corner pieces to retrieve a key that can open the door.

Avoid any of the lasers, holes and red enemy balls and collect as many diamonds as possible

Instructions

Click and drag the blue ball. Release the ball to collect the key and open the door.

Hope you enjoy my first Game Jam submission and my first real end-to-end game.

-JeanPant
